main event: A small white glowing object the size of a ping pong ball was observed in Miami, Florida for twenty seconds.
interesting points: The object faded out before disappearing completely., The object did not appear on radar., The sighting lasted for a short period of time., The source of the observation was a civilian consultant with 11 years of experience., The conclusion of the observation was that the object was probably a balloon.
witness description: civilian consultant with 11 years of experience
